name: CastleBan
description:
CastleBan is a simple puzzle game in where you push boxes on top of switches inside a castle setting. In order to progress to the next level you must push all the boxes on top of all the switches, but be careful because it is possible for you to make the wrong move that will call for a level restart.

CONTROLS:

  • MOVE with arrow keys;
  • LEAVE with [ESC]
  • SELECT(the playbutton) with [ENTER] or [SPACE]
  • RESTART LEVEL with [R]

Made with godot for the #LOWREZJAM
